H0.text: Lizard, frog, snake are the group of animals that contains only reptiles.

H1.text: Turtle, lizard, and crocodile are the group of animals that contains only reptiles.

H2.text: Octopus, snail, turtle is the group of animals that contains only reptiles.

H3.text: Crab, earthworm, snake is a group of animals that contains only reptiles.

A4.text: Turtles (order Testudines) are reptiles characterized by a special shell developed mainly from their ribs.

A5.text: Some early morphological phylogenetic studies have placed turtles closer to Lepidosauria (tuataras, lizards, and snakes) than to Archosauria (crocodilians and birds).
